hiwork1.text: On this site you will find practical advice and tips on how to effectively learn a new language for you. To do this, go to the page of the School.

hiwork2.text: On the Video page, you can view materials that will help you practice your listening comprehension and correct pronunciation. This will be a good conversation practice for you.

hiwork3.text: And of course, lessons with an experienced teacher will be very valuable, interesting and enjoyable for you, which will reveal other valuable moments to you as well as select the most effective training system for you personally. To do this, go to the Schedule page and see the free time for study. Then contact one of the addresses on the Contacts page and arrange with the teacher about the meeting online or live. Be sure, you will really like Yulia's professionalism!
